interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Nail Polish Remover Tools Set, 10pcs Nail Clip Caps, 2pcs Nail File, 100pcs Nail Remover Cotton Pads, 1pc Brush, 2pcs Sponge Finger Separator, 2 Cuticle Scraper and Pusher,1pc Pump Dispenser Bottle Review Date: 2020/09/20 Store: Lahien Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Lahien', 'Item Form': 'Wipe', 'Unit Count': '5.2911 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4.09 x 1.57 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '782910194566'} Review Text: This kit comes with everything you need to take off nail polish.
This particular set was for my mother in law who is just getting into gel polishes and she didn't understand what the clips were for at first 🤣
After I showed her how it took off the polish with scrubbing she was SOOOOO glad I got her this set! Review Title: Perfect for removal Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Liquid Foundation Cream, Concealer Cover Cream, BB Cream, Flawless Colour Changing Foundation Makeup Base Nude Face Liquid Cover Concealer, Universal for ALL Skin Types, SPF 15 Shell, 1.41 Fl Oz BUOCEANS Official {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Pores, Dryness', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 1.8 x 1.8 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} I am so glad they made a product like this because I can never seem to find the right color to match my skin and I end up with that Foundation the line on my chin with the two different colors. Not only is this product lightweight, it smells nice, plus it blends in with my skin tone almost perfectly. This is definitely going to be my go to Foundation. Awesome foundation! Hair Mask,Natural Repair Rejuvenating Hair Mask,Moisturizing Nourishing Hair for Dry and Damaged Hair,Professional Heating Deep Conditioning Hair Treatment LDREAMAM {'Brand': 'LDREAMAM', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Unit Count': '2 Count', 'Package Type': 'Jar', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 5.08 x 0.79 inches; 4.23 Ounces'} Made my hair soft again! Not the easiest thing to get on when you have long hair but I managed. Then after the time required I wash my hair and couldn't believe how soft it was. It hasn't been that soft in a long time. So I definitely think it was worth the trouble stuffing all my hair in there and letting it sit plus it doesn't smell the greatest, nor does it smell bad I'm just used to very perfumed shampoos. But I'll definitely be using it again. Softness again! Sea Salt Soap, Sea Mineral Soap, Invigorating Bath Soap, Cleaner Removal Pimple Pores Acne Goat Milk Moisturizing Face Care Soap, for All Skin type AMINZER {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'AMINZER', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free', 'Package Dimensions': '3.43 x 3.27 x 1.42 inches; 4.27 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1107-149'} Great for your pores and acne. My husband's back started breaking out and after using this for a few days it's clearing up and looks less irritated. Plus it came with a bag which I didn't know what for until I read the instructions and it is a foaming bag and it really makes the soap foam! Good for your pores 🧼🧼🧼 Color Changing Nail Polish, Gel Nail Polish Set, Nail Thermal Sensitive Liquid, Black Nail Polish Gel, Nail Art Brush Changeable Color Changing Liquid Kit 4Parts Cherioll {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Cherioll', 'Included Components': 'Gel Nail polish', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Package Dimensions': '8.3 x 6 x 1.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} I've had an obsession with gels with my time off from work these past months and I wanted to try this color changing polish.
It comes with designs and while the color itself is dark it does change.
I am enjoying trying the designs but man it does take practice!!! Been obsessed with gels 💅🏻 Poly Gel Nail Kit, opove Nail Builder Gel Extension Nail thickening Solution French Nail Art Equitment - 6 Colors 15ML opove {'Product Dimensions': '13.78 x 5.91 x 1.97 inches; 1.82 Pounds'} Never tried poly gel before, definitely not easy but worth it! Check out my nails in the photo, came out beautifully and they are very strong! Check these nails out! Nail Polish Remover Tools Set, 10pcs Nail Clip Caps, 2pcs Nail File, 100pcs Nail Remover Cotton Pads, 1pc Brush, 2pcs Sponge Finger Separator, 2 Cuticle Scraper and Pusher,1pc Pump Dispenser Bottle Lahien {'Brand': 'Lahien', 'Item Form': 'Wipe', 'Unit Count': '5.2911 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 4.09 x 1.57 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '782910194566'} This kit comes with everything you need to take off nail polish.
This particular set was for my mother in law who is just getting into gel polishes and she didn't understand what the clips were for at first 🤣
After I showed her how it took off the polish with scrubbing she was SOOOOO glad I got her this set! Perfect for removal
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Cosmetics Preferences:** The user maintains a preference for lightweight liquid foundations and concealers that provide good coverage and blend effortlessly. They continue to explore creative nail art, now showing a keen interest in nail care tools that enhance the nail enhancement experience.

- **Nail Care Enthusiasm:** Their recent purchase of a comprehensive nail polish remover set indicates a growing commitment to nail maintenance and an eagerness to facilitate the nail art process, particularly for those new to gel polishes.

- **Skin Type Consideration:** The user still values products suitable for all skin types, reinforcing their dedication to high-quality, inclusive cosmetics.

- **Color Matching:** Effective color matching remains a priority, with an ongoing search for innovative shades that meet their aesthetic needs.

- **Fragrance and Texture:** They prefer pleasant scents and sheer finishes in makeup, expressing openness to neutral fragrances in their beauty regimen.

- **Functionality:** Their interest in products addressing concerns like pores and dryness continues, with a clear focus on durability and overall effectiveness in both skincare and nail products.

- **General Sentiment:** The user showcases enthusiasm for high-performance cosmetics and skincare solutions that enhance their natural beauty. Their adventurous spirit, particularly in nail art and maintenance, reflects a versatile and playful engagement with beauty trends.

Overall, this user seeks effective, enjoyable products that balance performance with a pleasant user experience, highlighting their evolving interests in makeup and nail care.
